meta.name: description
meta.content: xAI is an AI company with the mission of advancing scientific discovery and gaining a deeper understanding of our universe.

meta.content: xAI is an AI company with the mission of advancing scientific discovery and gaining a deeper understanding of our universe.

body.class: __variable_c1e5c9 __variable_3a0388 dark min-h-screen overflow-x-hidden bg-background font-sans text-primary antialiased

header.class: fixed inset-x-0 top-0 z-50 duration-200 group -translate-y-0

div.class: pointer-events-none absolute inset-x-0 h-32 lg:h-24 duration-200 bg-gradient-to-b from-black lg:from-black/75 opacity-0
hidden lg:block fixed inset-x-0 top-0 bg-background/25 backdrop-blur pointer-events-none opacity-0 lg:pt-20

nav.class: flex items-center justify-between gap-4 duration-200 py-4 lg:h-20

a.class: text-primary/50 mono-tag px-3 py-1.5 text-sm hover:text-primary

text-primary/50 mono-tag px-3 py-1.5 text-sm hover:text-primary

relative isolate inline-flex items-center justify-center border text-base/6 uppercase font-mono tracking-widest shrink-0 focus:outline-none data-[focus]:outline data-[focus]:outline-2 data-[focus]:outline-offset-2 data-[focus]:outline-blue-500 data-[disabled]:opacity-50 [&>[data-slot=icon]]:-mx-0.5 [&>[data-slot=icon]]:my-0.5 [&>[data-slot=icon]]:shrink-0 [&>[data-slot=icon]]:sm:my-1 px-4 py-2 sm:text-sm [&>[data-slot=icon]]:size-5 [&>[data-slot=icon]]:sm:size-4 gap-x-3 bg-[--btn-bg] text-[--btn-text] border-[--btn-border] hover:bg-[--btn-hover] rounded-full [--btn-bg:transparent] [--btn-border:theme(colors.primary/25%)] [--btn-text:theme(colors.primary)] [--btn-hover:theme(colors.secondary/20%)]

button.class: relative isolate inline-flex items-center justify-center border text-base/6 uppercase font-mono tracking-widest shrink-0 focus:outline-none data-[focus]:outline data-[focus]:outline-2 data-[focus]:outline-offset-2 data-[focus]:outline-blue-500 data-[disabled]:opacity-50 [&>[data-slot=icon]]:-mx-0.5 [&>[data-slot=icon]]:my-0.5 [&>[data-slot=icon]]:shrink-0 [&>[data-slot=icon]]:sm:my-1 aspect-square px-4 py-2 sm:text-sm [&>[data-slot=icon]]:size-5 [&>[data-slot=icon]]:sm:size-4 gap-x-3 bg-[--btn-bg] text-[--btn-text] border-[--btn-border] hover:bg-[--btn-hover] rounded-full [--btn-bg:transparent] [--btn-border:theme(colors.primary/25%)] [--btn-text:theme(colors.primary)] [--btn-hover:theme(colors.secondary/20%)] visible lg:hidden

span.class: inline-block bg-gradient-to-b from-steel to-background to-[75%] bg-clip-text font-mono text-[10rem] font-light text-transparent sm:text-[20rem]

a.class: relative isolate inline-flex items-center justify-center border text-base/6 uppercase font-mono tracking-widest shrink-0 focus:outline-none data-[focus]:outline data-[focus]:outline-2 data-[focus]:outline-offset-2 data-[focus]:outline-blue-500 data-[disabled]:opacity-50 [&>[data-slot=icon]]:-mx-0.5 [&>[data-slot=icon]]:my-0.5 [&>[data-slot=icon]]:shrink-0 [&>[data-slot=icon]]:sm:my-1 px-4 py-2 sm:text-sm [&>[data-slot=icon]]:size-5 [&>[data-slot=icon]]:sm:size-4 gap-x-3 bg-[--btn-bg] text-[--btn-text] border-[--btn-border] hover:bg-[--btn-hover] rounded-full [--btn-bg:transparent] [--btn-border:theme(colors.primary)] [--btn-text:theme(colors.primary)] [--btn-hover:theme(colors.primary/20%)] mx-auto

div.class: relative w-full overflow-hidden border-t border-border/50 pb-32 md:pb-64
mx-auto w-full px-6 xl:max-w-7xl space-y-16 sm:space-y-32
